- The person eating corn is to the right of parkour (Clue 5), and biathlon is to the right of the electrician (Clue 3).
- Given that the Canadian is to the right of the helicopter driver (Clue 13) and considering the airplane driver's position relative to the Canadian and classical music fan (Clue 8), we start building a possible arrangement.
